channel.title: Comments on: Green Global Travel
channel.description: The best new WordPress Genesis things

item.title: By: Resa Barillas
item.dc:creator: Resa Barillas
item.description: We worked extensively to redevelop the Green Global Travel site experience. They have a wealth of incredible content and photos that we wanted to showcase, but we also felt it important to make sure the content was easy to find, organized, and visually engaging.
item.content:encoded: We worked extensively to redevelop the Green Global Travel site experience. They have a wealth of incredible content and photos that we wanted to showcase, but we also felt it important to make sure the content was easy to find, organized, and visually engaging.
